sentences.en: "The car, Annie," said Max rather grimly.— 'So okay. the car. What about it.'
sentences.cn: “安妮，那辆车，”马克斯颇为严厉地说。——“那么好吧，就说说那辆车。它是怎么回事？”

sentences.en: After the movie was finished, my husband reminded me that I am an Annie Sullivan.
sentences.cn: 看完电影后，我丈夫提醒我说，我就是一个安妮·莎莉文式的人。

sentences.en: Annie and her brother were sent to an orphanage.
sentences.cn: 安妮和她弟弟被送进了孤儿院.

sentences.en: Annie and Phil were engaged in a silent battle of wills, each refusing to leave.
sentences.cn: 安妮和菲尔默默地较上了劲, 谁也不肯离开.

sentences.en: Annie gave him the boot and married another man.
sentences.cn: 安妮突然抛弃了他去同别人结婚.

sentences.en: Annie shook a very rigid finger in his face.
sentences.cn: 安妮在他面前晃动着她那只僵硬的手指.

sentences.en: Annie told me to come right in.
sentences.cn: 安妮告诉我可以一直进来.

sentences.en: Annie took out her drawing pad and pencil to dash off a sketch of the Indians.
sentences.cn: 安妮拿出画本和铅笔,迅速地画了一幅印第安人的素描.

sentences.en: Annie was born a few weeks before Christmas.
sentences.cn: 安妮出生在圣诞节前几周。

sentences.en: Annie was ecstatic about the idea.
sentences.cn: 安妮为这个主意欣喜若狂.

sentences.en: Annie's performance pointed up her unique talent for music.
sentences.cn: 安妮的演出显出她独特的音乐才华.

sentences.en: Annie's work reflects her philosophy that life is full of mysteries.
sentences.cn: 安妮的作品反映了她的人生哲学，即生活充满神秘色彩。

sentences.en: Dear Annie: I hope you and your readers have some suggestions for me, because I'm just about at the end of my rope.
sentences.cn: 亲爱的安妮： 我希望您和您的读者可以给我提些建议，因为我实在是山穷水尽，毫无办法了。

sentences.en: Scots-born Annie, 37, has recently re-launched her phenomenally successful singing career.
sentences.cn: 生于苏格兰的安妮37岁，最近复出，再度投身于其辉煌的歌唱事业中。

sentences.en: We goofed last week at the end of our interview with singer Annie Ross.
sentences.cn: 上周我们采访歌手安妮·罗斯，结果到快结束时犯了个愚蠢的错误。

trans.tran_cn: 安妮（女子名， Ann 的昵称）
